show.title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam - 2
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/HWPzkR
show.description: Shivani's enemies chase her for redemption. Will Shivani & team suruvive this threat? When Police Commissioner Sathyamoorthy and Inspector Krishna attempt to bring down Chennai's ruthless gangster Panchali by orchestrating a conflict with a minister's son, their plan catastrophically backfires - leading to brutal murders, political interference, and a deadly game of cat and mouse where the hunters become the hunted.
show.description_secondary: Shivani's enemies chase her for redemption. Will Shivani & team suruvive this threat? When Police Commissioner Sathyamoorthy and Inspector Krishna attempt to bring down Chennai's ruthless gangster Panchali by orchestrating a conflict with a minister's son, their plan catastrophically backfires - leading to brutal murders, political interference, and a deadly game of cat and mouse where the hunters become the hunted.
